M12/1/A1GEO/HP1/GEO/TZ0/XX




     22120109

GEORGIAN A1 – HIGHER LEVEL – PAPER 1
GÉORGIEN A1 – NIVEAU SUPÉRIEUR – ÉPREUVE 1
GEORGIANO A1 – NIVEL SUPERIOR – PRUEBA 1

Thursday 10 May 2012 (morning)
Jeudi 10 mai 2012 (matin)
Jueves 10 de mayo de 2012 (mañana)

2 hours / 2 heures / 2 horas


Instructions to candidates

 Do not open this examination paper until instructed to do so.
 Write a commentary on one passage only.
 The maximum mark for this examination paper is [25 marks].

INSTRUCTIONS DESTINÉES AUX CANDIDATS

 N’ouvrez pas cette épreuve avant d’y être autorisé(e).
 Rédigez un commentaire sur un seul des passages.
 Le nombre maximum de points pour cette épreuve d’examen est [25 points].

INSTRUCCIONES PARA LOS ALUMNOS

 No abra esta prueba hasta que se lo autoricen.
 Escriba un comentario sobre un solo fragmento.
 La puntuación máxima para esta prueba de examen es [25 puntos].




2212-0109                                                                                 4 pages/páginas

dawereT erT-erTi teqstis komentari:

1.

                 EparizSi maTxovars oTaxi iSviaTad aqvs. misi bina aris kaTedralebis
            _ notr damis, sansuplisis _ galavnebi, Rame sZinavT senis xidebs qveS.
            dRisiT maTxovrebi agroveben papirosis namwvavebs.       quCaSi dafantul
            qaRaldebs, ZonZebs.
      5          quCebSi akrZalulia _ maTxovroben ezoebSi. zogi atyuebs quCis aJans.
            daiWers erT Zvel gazeTs `la patris~, TiTqos gamyidvelia da mxolod
            saimedo gamvlels gaumJRavnebs Tavis saidumloebas.
                 saRamos senis napirebi savsea maTxovrebiT.        sena mwvaned aris
            amRvreuli, rogorc absenti. wylis zedapiri elvarebs qoniT, mazuTiT.
     10     TeTri gedebiviT mihqrian patara gemebi da navebi. senis xidebqveS didi
            xmaurobaa… umetesoba kamaTobs omze, revoluciaze, Joresis mkvlelobaze.
            yvelaze cnobili maT Soris aris gaston delaroS, romelsac megobrebma
            `falieri~ daarqves: hgavs yofil prezidents.
                 rodesac is dainaxavs ucxo stumars, xidis qveS Camosuls, miva
     15     da etyvis:
                 _ Tqven albaT norvegiidan Camosuli turisti xarT, an espaneli
            momRerali, gainteresebT parizi da Cveni cxovreba. me gaxlavarT gaston
            delaroS, keTilSobili maTxovari, mcxovrebi senis napiras, deputat
            Joresis megobari da misi amomrCeveli.
     20          amis Semdeg is dagimtkicebT, Tu ra advilia uecrad gamaTxovreba.
            Semdeg amayad ityvis: amaRam sicive iqneba, gaTenebisas aq yovelTvis
            Zalian civa. me Tqveni fuli ar minda, gaiareT aqedan kafe `paskalSi~
            da daukveTeT CemTvis ori Wiqa punSi, xval diliT mival da Tqvens
            sadRegrZelos davlev.
     25          falieri yvelaze bevrs kamaTobs. yoveldRe kiTxulobs `lumanites~,
            icis politika, ejavreba roialistebi da winaaRmdegia berlinis okupaciis.
            konkordiis moedanze aRtacebiT uxdis quds elzasisa da lorenis Zeglebs
            da zizRiT ixseniebs bismarks, romelmac `rkinis yuTSi Cahketa elzasisa da
            lorenis ayvavebuli baRebi~. is meTaurobs kavSirs `senis maTxovrebisas~
     30     da sastikad devnis qurdebs maTxovarT Soris.
                 erT Rames me, ilia erenburgi da giom apolineri vewvieT maTxovrebis
            banaks aleqsandre mesamis xidis qveS.     maSin omi dawyebuli iyo da
            banaki namdvil parlaments hgavda.     iyo kamaTi da Tavmjdomarec iyo.
            erTi maTxovari, yofili konsierJi qimiuri laboratoriisa, uxsnida
     35     danarCenebs `maxrCobela gazebis mniSvnelobas~.        gazebis gamogoneba
            yvelas abrazebda, radgan is xels Seuwyobda maTxovrobis gavrcelebas
            safrangeTSi. Ramis ori saaTi iyo, kamaTi ar Tavdeboda. yvelas Sioda.
                 aTi maTxovari me, apolinerma da erenburgma wamoviyvaneT kafe
            `ala rotondaSi~ savaxSmod. `rotonda~ Cveni megobrebiT iyo savse da
     40     maTxovrebis danaxvam aRtaceba gamoiwvia.




2212-0109
                                            –3–              M12/1/A1GEO/HP1/GEO/TZ0/XX

                 msxvili ribeira, espaneli mxatvari, naxevrad titveli iyo, radgan sicxe
            awuxebda. man saTiTaod gadahkocna Cveni stumrebi, mivida erT cnobili
            mxatvrebis mecenatTan, romelic dadioda `rotondaSi~ da cdilobda xelSi
            Caegdo zangis qali jelika, lamazi da TevziviT moqnili. ribeira movida
   45       mecenatTan, magrad dahkra joxi katelokze da ubrZana vaxSmis gawyoba.
            mecenats etkina Tavi, magram gaicina da vaxSami gaamarTvina.
                 maTxovrebi, poetebi da mxatvrebi mecenatis stumrebi viyaviT.
            diasaxlisebad avirCieT jelika da marevna, mxatvari qali, parizSi
            Tbilisidan Camosuli.        pirvelad ribeiram adRegrZela mecenati da
   50       ukanasknelis xarjze ubrZana kafes patrons xuT-xuTi franki gadaeca
            TiTo maTxovrisaTvis. brZaneba Sesrulda. mecenats ewyina, magram xelze
            akoca jelikas.
                 Semdeg jelikam Tqva: `amxanagebo, Cven gvewvivnen `senis moqalaqeni~,
            aseTi suraTi jer Cvens rotondas ar axsovs.           Cven Soris dRes ar
   55       aris is, vinc gaocdeba am suraTiT _ miscems mas ukvdavebas.             Cemi
            winadadebaa gaegzavnos avtomobili pablo pikasos da eTxovos aq mosvla~.
            apolinerma jelikas tuCebSi akoca, magram avtomobili carieli dabrunda:
            wina dRiT pikaso frontze wasuliyo.
                 rodesac maTxovari emil aderi adga sityvis saTqmelad, moxucebuli
   60       da keTili `rotondis~ garsoni lui mivida masTan, atirda da Tqva:
                 _ batono emil, nuTu ver micaniT, me var lui garsoni kafe `riSidan~.
            bevri luidori maxsovs Tqvengan naCuqari. didi xania gavige Tqveni dacema,
            gaRaribeba. me ucolo var da kargi oTaxi maqvs. gadmobrZandiT CemTan
            binaze…
   65            _ da axla ki, batonebo, neba miboZeT, _ moiwminda cremlebi luim, _
            baton emil aderis pativsacemad mogarTvaT eqvsi boTli burgundiisa.
                 emil aderma sityva veRar Tqva, ena daeba, Caekra moxucebul keTil
            luis da orive wavidnen meore oTaxSi warsulis dasatireblad. am suraTis
            danaxvaze, axalgazrda poetma albert Janma leqsi dawera da gadasca
   70       erenburgs rusulad saTargmnelad.         rodesac gaTenda, me gamoveTxove
            parizel megobrebs da im dResve wamovedi saqarTveloSi.
                 `rotondis~ ukanaskneli Rame dRemde ar damviwyebia, maxsovdnen senis
            maTxovrebi.

                                               paolo iaSvili, `feradi buStebi~ (1924)




2212-0109                                          Turn over / Tournez la page / Véase al dorso
                                       –4–           M12/1/A1GEO/HP1/GEO/TZ0/XX

2.

            mze Caesvena: mis Suqi gamosalmis Jams kavkassa,
            Tavsa exveva alersiT, viT qali mamas moxucsa.
            bumberaz mTani mdumared caTamdis ayudebulni,
            hsxedan, viT devni, spetakis yinul-gvirgviniT Semkulni!
        5   maT kldovan gverdTa Savada Rrubelni zed dahswolian,
            da mrisxanebiT qveyanas warRvniTa emuqrebian,
            gazafxulisa veliTa tye Semosili simwvaniT,
            mTebisa kalTebs Seamkobs satkbo sunnelTa mofeniT.
            wyalni mTiT daqanebulni, almasebr ufskruls hscvivian,
       10   Tergi hrbis, Tergi Rrialebs, kldeni bans eubnebian!
            Sewuxebuli vumzer gzas da masze etlsa mimsrbolsa,
            mimtacsa yovlis keTilis, raca gvaqvs ama sofelsa,
            raca gviSvenebs sicocxles zeciurisa sxiviTa,
            da aRgvamaRlebs am sofliT sulisa aRmafreniTa!
       15   midixar satrfov? mSvidobiT! marad dRe Cemi kurTxeva
            cad mimarT SenTvis meqneba, vidremdis suli meleva.
            arRa aamon aw TvalTa guli Senisa xilviTa,
            warvides Cemi sicocxle uSenod SromiT, zrunviTa.
            etli hrbis, satrfo mSordebis… Tana hsdevs Cemi mas suli,
       20   vmzer… Sors ZlivsRa hsCans… aRar hsCans… raRasa vumzer Smag-qmnili?
            siSoris nislma mihfara TvalTagan etli mimsrboli,
            da guliT oxvra simwaris aRmouteve unebli…
            mSvidobiT! vinca damatkbe sicocxlis netarebiTa,
            aw visTvis guli mikvnesis, suli hswuxs ganSorebiTa.
       25   vis xilva arRa Semmosavs sixarulisa naTliTa,
            ar ganmasvenebs mwuxares alersis xmiTa tkbiliTa!
            maram am sofels Sens garda vina myavs manugeSeblad,
            rom Senc ganmSordi, damtove, mwuxarebisa me msxverplad?
            waxvel, warmtace yoveli saamebeli sulisa,
       30   da vin ganmiRos aw kari bedisa dakargulisa?
            an me ugunurs rad mrwamda bedisa dausruleba?
            aw davSTi martod… mSvidobiT! Sens suls nu hSordes mSvidoba!
            ars mwuxareba sulisa, ar aqvs nugeSi romelsa,
            hsjobs ena hsdumdes, xma Seswydes, moTqmiT ra ergos gul-wylulsa?
       35   SeRamda… marto vzi WmunviT; Cemi Civili vis esmis?
            dayruvda are… mxoloda xma ismis zogjer guSagis.
            mxolod hsCans, mTani mdumared ayudebulan caTamdis,
            da yazibegsa saamod zeda varskvlavi dahnaTis!
            wyalni mTiT daqanebulni, ufskrulsa ikargebian,
       40   Tergi hrbis, Tergi Rrialebs, kldeni bans eubnebian!

                                grigol orbeliani, `saRamo gamosalmebisa~ (1841)




2212-0109
